description: Will you be visiting NYC for the holidays and need a place to crash? My spacious apartment is available from Dec 14th - Dec 28th. I would prefer to have someone stay the entire time, but I'm flexible. Large Bedroom w/Queen Sized Bed & Large Living Room w/Futon. Great for a couple or 2-3 friends. 25 min into Midtown, near the A, C, & 1 trains. Laundromats & Farmer's Market across the street. 3 Other grocery stores in the neighborhood along with a Rite-Aid, Starbucks, Dunkin Donuts & Chipotle.
name: Entire Apt All To Yourself For Your Holiday In NYC
